author: matth
msg: Added "dropTables" flag to ddl task so that the initial DROP statements can be left out.  Postgres 7.4 seems to be quite strict about
errors encountered during a transaction.  Added some license headers and removed some author tags.  Added a small test for the ddl
task which isn't very good.  Removed howto xdocs since they're really Torque docs -- I'm not sure why they were here.

author: matth
msg: Patch to OracleBuilder was using old method names in model.Column and didn't compile.  So, I fixed it.  I'm still
very new to this applying patches thing...
